tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_texts (
    text_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_year INT,
    text_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalTexts (
    text_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    text_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Manuscripts (
    manuscript_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id UUID REFERENCES HistoricalTexts(text_id),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    condition VARCHAR(255),
    date_discovered DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_texts (
    text_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    text_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_name TEXT,
    publication_year INT,
    text_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE manuscripts (
    manuscript_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    manuscript_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_name TEXT,
    manuscript_type TEXT,
    year_written INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_sources (
    source_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    source_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_name TEXT,
    publication_year INT,
    source_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE texts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE manuscripts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year_written INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    affiliation VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Texts (
    text_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    year_published INT,
    text_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Manuscripts (
    manuscript_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manuscript_title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    year_created INT,
    storage_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Authors (
    author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name TEXT,
    birth_year INT,
    nationality TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name TEXT,
    research_topic TEXT,
    institution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Text_Management (
    management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    manuscript_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    date_added DATE
)
